Trade/Device Name(s): ePlex Blood Culture Identification Panel - Gram Positive (BCID-GP) Panel
ePlex Blood Culture Identification Gram-Positive (BCID-GP) Panel
ePlex® Blood Culture Identification Gram-Positive (BCID-GP) Panel
Regulation Name(s): Multiplex nucleic acid assay for identification of microorganisms and resistance markers from positive blood cultures
Specimen Container(s): Continuous monitoring blood culture system bottle
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the ePlex BCID-GP Panel, a multiplex nucleic acid assay for rapid detection and identification of gram-positive bacteria, select gram-negative bacteria, Candida species, and antimicrobial resistance markers from positive blood cultures on the ePlex system
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative detection and identification of multiple potentially pathogenic gram-positive bacterial organisms and select resistance markers, as well as certain gram-negative bacteria and Candida species, from positive blood culture samples to aid in diagnosis of bloodstream infections in conjunction with other clinical and laboratory data
